text: @BryanCranston @TimeTravelDaveR I think pity is probably the best response. I also hope for more forensic, less tribal media. I'm sure consensus is out there for a better post Covid19 future. A redefinition of 'essential' whether that be workers or our own rampant consumption. #sottovoce
